name: The Rise and Fall of Ella V (Raining Sideways)
name_original: The Rise and Fall of Ella V (Raining Sideways)
description:
Play as Ella, an inter-dimensional elevator operator who's trying her best to get everybody where they need to go in a timely fashion. Match each rider to their respective floors and manage how long each of them have had to wait. This game was made by Video Game Development Club for our fall 2017 semester project. 

Use the up and down arrow keys to change floors, the left arrow key to invite people in to your elevator, and the right arrow key to let the off at the floor you're on. You can let people out on the wrong floor to get to someone behind them if you need, but their timers will not reset.

I was sound team lead for this project and made both the Lobby Theme and the Cat Song.

Lobby Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/lobby-theme

Cat Song: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/cat-song

VGDC: https://vgdc.umn.edu/
